Posts.Content: I also think you should file formal complaints with anesthesiologist, surgeon and hospital ! That surgeon was TOTALLYunethical
Posts.Title: Has anyone been denied anasthesia when having a port placed?

Posts.Content: That sounds truly horrible! I am so sorry you had to endure that. My onc wants me to get a port your horrible story is making that no longer possibility !
Posts.Title: Has anyone been denied anasthesia when having a port placed?
